Lobby - Class in network
The matchmaking system for the server Singleton pattern is used to ensure that only two instance of this class are created (one for 2 players matches and one for 3 players matches) When a Client Handler listener thread reaches out this class, it will wait enough players to start a match.
logger - Static variable in class network.Client
Client Side Logger.
logger - Static variable in class network.Server
Server Side Logger Instance
LoginDataMessage - Class in network.messages.toserver
The first message sent to the server containing the username and the number of players of the game

Creates a LoginDataMessage instance
LONG_USERNAME - Static variable in class view.ClientErrorMessages
 
LOSER - model.Outcome
The player has lost the game but is already spectating the game
